## ⚠️ Important Note
**Please note:** This is a personal project maintained by a non-expert programmer in their spare time. For questions and help:
- 🕐 **Response time** may vary (I work on this when time permits)
- 🤔 **Complex questions** might require research time on my part
- 📚 **Learning process** - sometimes I'll need to figure things out too
- 🔄 **Best effort** - I'll do my best but may not have all the answers

Thank you for your patience and understanding! 🙏
